tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trade_surveillance_activities (
  trade_id INT NOT NULL,
  trader_id INT NOT NULL,
  trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  trade_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  market_regulations_complied BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (trade_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_surveillance_activities (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trader_name VARCHAR(50),
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    trade_symbol VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE Trade_Surveillance (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_date DATE,
  trade_symbol VARCHAR(50),
  trade_volume INT,
  trader_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Surveillance_Logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  log_message TEXT,
  trade_id INT,
  trader_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE trade_activities (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_type VARCHAR(50),
    traded_symbol VARCHAR(50),
    trade_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE surveillance_alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_date DATE,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_description TEXT,
    trade_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (trade_id) REFERENCES trade_activities(trade_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_surveillance_activities (
   trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   trader_name VARCHAR(255),
   trade_date DATE,
   trade_volume INT,
   trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_alerts (
   alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   trade_id INT,
   alert_type VARCHAR(50),
   alert_message TEXT,
   alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
